pageContext.claim: “This vision for peace is fundamentally different from past proposals. In the past, even the most well-intentioned plans were light on factual details and heavy on conceptual frameworks. By contrast, our plan is 80 pages and is the most detailed proposal ever put forward by far.”
pageContext.analysis: Previous peace proposals were more conceptual because it was left to the two parties -- Israel and the Palestinians -- to begotiate the details. The Trump administration only negotiated with Israel and the Palestinians did not cooperate. The plan was immediately rejected by Arab nations and the Palestinians.
